# Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy sets forth how Ai Tools ("we", "our", or "us") gather,
utilize, and share your data when you interact with our website (aitools.fyi),
our mobile application, or any other online offerings we provide.

By availing
of our services, you are consenting to our collection, use, and sharing of
your information in line with the stipulations in this Privacy Policy.

## Data We May Collect

We may gather diverse data about our users, such as:

  * Personal data that you provide, such as your name, email address, and profile picture when you establish an account or amend your profile.
* Data collected when you use our services, including your IP address, the type of device and browser you're using, and your operating system.
* Data from third-party sources, including social media platforms, advertisement networks, and analytics service providers.

We do not
intentionally gather personal data from children who are under 13 years of
age.

## Third-Party Cookies:

We utilize third-party cookies from service providers like Google Analytics,
to aid us in scrutinizing how you use our Services and boost their
functionality.

These service providers may use their own cookies and
comparable technologies to gather data about your online activities across
different websites and services.

# Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy sets forth how Ai Tools ("we", "our", or "us") gather,
utilize, and share your data when you interact with our website (aitools.fyi),
our mobile application, or any other online offerings we provide.

By availing
of our services, you are consenting to our collection, use, and sharing of
your information in line with the stipulations in this Privacy Policy.

## Disclosure of Your Information

We may share your data in the following ways:

  * To service providers executing tasks on our behalf.
* To other users of our services, for instance, when you interact with them via our platform.
* To third-party partners for promotional and advertisement purposes unless you decide to opt-out.
* To law enforcement or regulatory bodies if we deem such disclosure necessary to adhere to legal requirements or to safeguard our rights or the rights of others.

## Your Rights

You have specific rights regarding how we utilize and share your data:

  * You can access and modify your account data at any moment.
